I have been a premium subscriber for most of that . This fall they came out with the feature to make an account instead of having all your data just saved on your phone. When I did that, I lost hundreds of custom affirmations and collections that I had made for different occasions in my life. Over a month ago, I informed the development team about this and followed up a couple weeks later, and I have received no support or feedback on whether or when they can get my account info restored. I wish I had never created an account at all because when I deleted the app and reinstalled it to see if that would fix some of the bugs, I lost almost everything.
